page.title: 05Trade around Fearn.
page.content: Trade in our area is varied.A bulk haulage firm is run by E.Ross and A.Ross and Sons are the local builders.There are three painters and decorators-I.Blackhall,R.Clyne and P.Mackenzie.J.Oman is a field drainage contractor.The local shop is owned by H.Smith.A. Cockell who owns Fearn Service Station hires out a Rolls Royce for weddings.Robertson Agrichemicals serves the local farming community.W.H.Mackay,Balmuchy is a large metal working concern making pre-fabricated structures.Recently the local joiner,A.Ravenhill was carrying out repairs in our school.There are two public houses-The New Inn and one attached to the hotel.Fearn Hotel is the only facility here where tourists can stay.It is fairly small and is being renovated by local tradesmen at the moment.
